programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Cheltenham, the first to host is 46-year-old Belgian-born hotel consultant Oli Delaunoy. Oli plans to wow his guests with his posh scallop starter and meaty main, but its his loud and vivacious personality hes banking on.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the second day of the competition in Cheltenham and the turn of glamorous nurse Jan Blomer to host. Jan hopes to impress with her good honest home cooking: chicken with sun dried tomatoes for her main and home-made ice cream for dessert.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Third to host in Cheltenham is super competitive events director and body building fanatic Zak Roby. Zak cooks Thai `Tien of Crab served with fashionable micro herbs and a duo of duck main.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the fourth day of the competition in Cheltenham and the turn of Aussie admin assistant Kimberley Thomas. She aims for a sophisticated evening, and hopes to impress with her meaty starter of pork belly and apple salad and her pie main course.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final day of the competition in Cheltenham, and the turn of stay-at-home dad Paddy Castledine to host. Paddy plans to walk away with the prize by serving a simple menu with quality ingredients.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In Romania, Jonas and Ulrike carry on the legacy of their forefathers at a traditional Saxon village. And we catch up with seasoned village saviours Lolly and Sean in France.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: John and Karly dream of owning a holiday home on Spains Costa Almería for all their family to enjoy. Lee Juggurnauth shows them what their £90k can buy.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Operation Daybreak
programme.desc: In 1942 Czechoslovakia, SS-General Reinhard Heydrich is appointed to become the Reich Protector of Bohemia and Moravia. The terror and oppression that follow cause Allied authorities in London to authorise a secret mission to kill the man who has come to be known as `The Butcher of Prague. The film explores shows the operation leading up to Heydrichs death as well as the massive German reprisals that followed it.

programme.title: Breakfast

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Live
programme.desc: Alex Jones is joined by chefs Bryn Williams, Andi Oliver and Ravneet Gill, and by special guest Ben Elton. Drinks expert Olly Smith picks the wines to go with the studio dishes. There are also some great moments from the BBC food archive.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick meets Pip and Matt Smith, with their herd of 600 red deer, on a north Cornish farm that has been in Pips family for over three centuries. With some very fine organic venison, Rick returns to his kitchen to make a venison wellington.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Tommy sees the potential in a bungalow in the beautiful Norfolk Broads, while Dion is on familiar turf in both Stoke and Coventry with two intriguing projects.

programme.title: BBC Weekend News
programme.desc: National and international news, followed by weather.

programme.title: BBC Weather

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The show visits an antiques fair in Shepton Mallet as Christina learns about the colourful history of American quilts.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Jacqui Joseph tries out a bold peacock design on a sideboard, but her efforts might leave her fanning out the cash.

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: Ben, Shelley and their kids Eva and Maya live in Wing in Buckinghamshire. Their garden is sloped, impractical and has a tiny patio. Having travelled extensively across Europe, the couple now dream of a Mediterranean courtyard garden.

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In South Wales, Nick and the team take on the task of transforming the home of Dan and his partner Anna, after a freak accident shattered their dreams of moving in together. After nearly a year in hospital, and now a wheelchair user, Dan desperately needs his terraced house to become a place where he can focus on his rehabilitation and his goal of walking again. Despite the teams tireless efforts, the house stubbornly fights back at every turn, pushing everyone to the limit.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Two Eurovision enthusiasts need Denise Nurses help to find them, and their cat Larry, a new home in the Cumbrian countryside. Away from the house hunting, Denise meets up with a young family of keen climbers and outdoor adventurers.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: The red carpet is rolled out for the first theme week of the series: movie night in the ballroom. Something wicked comes this way, as our pros pay homage to the biggest grossing movie musical of all time, before our couples perform routines celebrating some of the best-loved films from across cinema history. As they do their best to impress the Judges and you at home, Academy Award-nominated Hollywood superstar Cynthia Erivo is on hand to help our couples deliver blockbuster performances.

programme.title: The Weakest Link
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan hosts this Battle of the Nations Special, where two celebrities from each of the four home nations battle it out to claim the winners crown for their country.

programme.title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue
programme.desc: The survivors work out how to call for help - but are faced with a treacherous climb; as some of the group begin to crack under the pressure, a third death - the most violent so far - warns that they are running out of time.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Roo Irvine discovers an extraordinary collection of miniature outfits that traces the changes in fashion over the last 1,000 years. At the Grosvenor Museum in Chester, Roo meets former costume designer Lisa Jayne Smith, who has dressed more than 100 dolls in elaborate period costume. At the fair in Oswestry, the teams are hoping theyre dressed for success. The reds are guided by Danny Sebastian. Theyre up against Colin Young and the blues.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Planet Earth Live
programme.desc: Sam, Sophie and Sybil are three tiny black bear cubs who have just emerged from their den in the Northwoods of Minnesota. But this spectacular wilderness is full of threats, wolves and coyotes roam the forest looking for stray cubs, the weather can be dangerously unpredictable bringing blizzards and forest fires, and every year some of the black bears are killed by humans. Their survival depends entirely on the experience of their mother and how well they learn the skills she teaches them.

programme.title: Dynasties
programme.desc: High in the mountains of Morocco lives a descendant of a long line of macaque rulers. She has been in charge of this troupe for many winters - one of the longest recorded reigns of an alpha - but this year is likely to be her last.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by banished and murdered celebrity players to discuss their time on the show - and to reveal the identity of the Traitors for the very first time...

programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: Twelve single Australians get a shot at true love in the wildest ever dating experience as they are matched, married and left stranded on a desert island for 21 days.

programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Nori and Dot are stuck in a tree house without a door. How can Mojo and Bo get them out? By sending the treehouse flying across town, thats how!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When a pack of pesky, migrating trilobites overrun the ship, Big Lizard has to use a hidden talent to lure them away. But one little trilobite, Rex, decides to stay.

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: Whilst on a quest to return the Icicle of Destiny, Trevor topples into a cavern of tiny mushrooms who treat him like a king.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series
programme.desc: Liko and Floragato try out Terastallisation in a battle against Cortondo Gym leader Katy.

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: Its time to go undercover and discover who makes the best spy. Laser mazes, gadgets and creative camouflage - only one spy will take the win.

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
programme.desc: Nitro and Phantom prank Fire at a kids birthday party! The rest of the Gladiators have fun behind-the-scenes and pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

programme.title: Blue Peter
programme.sub-title: Silly Challenges with Harry Hill and Can Joel Become a Butler?
programme.desc: Childrens magazine with things to make, celebrity guests, music, sport, food and a whole lot more. You can earn a Blue Peter badge by getting creative and entering competitions.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

programme.title: Deadly Predators
programme.desc: Steve uncovers the secrets of sharks, the worlds most infamous predators. He heads out into the Atlantic ocean to dive with blue sharks, a beautiful but deadly species which can travel up to 10,000km per year looking for food. He finds out how their big pectoral fins allow them to glide gracefully through the water, and how they are now threatened by overfishing for their fins.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: Traditional Tibetan Buddhist prayers from Kagyu Samye Ling Monastery, Scotland. Featuring chanting prayers, reciting mantras and offerings.

programme.title: Summer Holiday
programme.desc: Pop musical with Cliff Richard and the Shadows about four London Transport mechanics trying to run a European travel service with a double-decker bus. Along the way they pick up an American girl who is on the run from stardom, her press agent and her overbearing mother.

programme.title: Kelvins Big Farming Adventure
programme.desc: Strictly star Kelvin Fletcher has bought a 120-acre farm in the Peaks. With no experience, he sees his stress levels quickly rise, and then a maggot-infested sheep foot sends him over the edge.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Bakeation
programme.desc: Si and Dave make Apfelstrudel with the owner of a roadside BandB, cook Linzertorte in Linz, and a chocolate gugelhupf cake for a bunch of bikers from Huddersfield.

programme.title: Nicholas and Alexandra
programme.desc: When Tsar Nicholas weds the German princess Alexandra, the marriage proves unpopular with the Russian people, a situation not improved when she has four daughters. When she finally bears a son, the infants acute haemophilia can only be controlled by the powers of the fanatical monk Rasputin.

programme.title: The Mirror Crackd
programme.desc: Rival Hollywood stars and a visiting American film crew complicate Miss Marples investigation into a double murder.

programme.title: Animal Babies: First Year on Earth
programme.desc: In Kenya, a new-born elephant calf Safina is learning how to keep up with her fast moving herd. In Sri Lanka, one-week-old Jazir has to quickly learn the ropes of a primate society that is enmeshed with the world of people.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Michael Baggot and Adam Partridge visit Haddon Hall in Derbyshire and Paul takes a look at 20th-century British war art at the Imperial War Museum.

programme.title: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
programme.desc: In 1946 a London based writer begins exchanging letters with the residents of Guernsey, an island occupied by Germany during WWII. She feels compelled to visit the island and gain some understanding of life during the occupation.

programme.title: Pavarotti: The Last Tenor
programme.desc: A tribute to Luciano Pavarotti who died earlier today.

programme.title: Pavarotti in London
programme.desc: Luciano Pavarotti sings popular arias by Verdi, Puccini and others, accompanied by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra, to an audience including the Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother.

programme.title: Pavarotti: King of the High Cs
programme.desc: Luciano Pavarotti sang some of operas most demanding roles, Manrico in `Il trovatore, Rodolfo in `La bohème and Cavaradossi in `Tosca, winning him the highest critical acclaim. He was acknowledged a true successor to two of the greatest opera singers to have ever lived, Enrico Caruso and Beniamino Gigli. In this introspective, Pavarotti talks about his life and performs arias by Verdi, Puccini and Leoncavallo, accompanied by the Orchestra Stabile Romagna, conducted by Leone Magiera.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Colchester to Chappel and Wakes Colne
programme.desc: Michaels exploration of Essex is drawing to a close. He visits Colchester, which was first mentioned in AD77 and proudly claims to be Britains oldest recorded town. He finishes his tour of Essex by driving an old Intercity 125 high speed train.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: A car crash has traumatic consequences for Aisling, while the fallout creates a deadly situation for the section. Grace turns to child protection to try and help Lindsay.

programme.desc: Evil Pea learns of Supertatos greatest weakness - jelly - and uses it against him.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Pando experiment with Bings toy train on the Fun Fort in the playground. The train is good at going over bridges and brilliant at going down the slide. But when Bing slides it off the roof of the playhouse, the train crashes and breaks. Bing is upset until he realises that the pieces fit together to make something completely different.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Sula, Pando and Bing discover a birds nest while making a playhouse in the shed. They try to find the bird by being super quiet, and she flies into their playhouse. When Bing goes in to look for her, she flies out again; they cant both be in the playhouse at the same time. So Bing decides to give the shed to her until her chicks have all grown up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Happy discovers his wobbly tooth has come out, but hes lost it! Hes having a problem remembering where he was when it fell out. The Squirrels start to look for it but they cant find the tooth anywhere.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are rushing around, so Duggee shows them how to enjoy things at a slower pace. However, they soon come across Tortoise, who needs to get to the hospital as his wife is having babies. Duggee and the Squirrels need to get him there fast!

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch makes the Statue of Liberty fall right into the path of a passing ferry.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: When Mr Bouncer invents something that seemingly has no specific function, the rabbits endeavour to find out what its for. But when Mr Tod comes after them, will the thing-a-ma-jig be a help or a hindrance in their escape?

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers roam the oceans in search of adventure and fun. When Dashi is accidentally swallowed by a Whale Shark, the Octonauts venture inside the huge fish to rescue her.

programme.title: Activate with Joe Wicks
programme.desc: Flex and bend into my ExtraStretchy Challenge. Stretch your skills with arm circles, lunges and toe taps, then get flexible in the Activate.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.sub-title: Koas Sweet Tooth; Tobys Blurry Blunders

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: A shark on the loose in the streets of Swoppiton? Mojo and Bo are on a fishing trip to find out more! But the hungry shark may not be quite as hungry-sharky as they think.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Justin and his friends visit an enchanted castle to make a magic wand and fly on a broomstick. Meanwhile, The Great Tumbleeny performs some magic himself, with varying success.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At a picnic, Bluey and her friends play Shadowlands, but when Coco keeps taking shortcuts, Bluey has to show her that following the rules can make the game more fun.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still cant beat Dad.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels have bought Hennie a present for her birthday, but first they need to wrap it up. Its very big and will need rather a lot of paper and sticky tape. The Squirrels each choose some colourful paper and get wrapping. Its all going very well until the very last bit of paper and sticky tape. Who ever said this was going to be easy?

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. But hang on - who does that huge teddy belong to? Oh! Thats not a teddy at all! Its Beryl, and shes a real bear! She wants to join in the fun but has no teddy of her own, so the Squirrels make her one using sticks, leaves, acorns... and a big pink sock! Now Beryl can join the picnic with everyone else.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: After Pancake saves him from a mishap, Flutter vows to repay the debt. But his risk-averse behaviour drives Pan to distraction until a real emergency allows the debt to be repaid.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Twig steals Cosimas volleyball. A chase leads Big Lizard and Cosima to her den and also to a happy discovery.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit St Basils Cathedral, but birthday boy Grandmaster Glitch has glitched it.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch gets his hands on a G.O. Force, the forecast isnt good for the Tarbela Dam in Pakistan.

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.sub-title: Picture Perfect Pandemonium; Catch That Panther Pod
programme.desc: The gang has to stop Zola from stealing art. Doc Ock finds Black Panthers tech.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts and the Hot Spring Snake
programme.desc: Dashi, Tweak and Tunip search for hot springs after mudslides force a snake out of his home; the Octonauts help hungry pupfish find their algae snack.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley cleans Cynthias bus, but each time he does it keeps getting dirty again. Its so dirty by the end, he invents a super-duper cleaning machine that makes a sea of bubbles.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad and the Prickly
programme.desc: Prickly Pear arrives in the supermarket and tries to take over Evil Peas freezer. Supertato discovers that Prickly Pear isnt mean at all and just needs some good friends.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: Lily and Plume find a washed-up bottle with what looks like a treasure map inside!

programme.title: Football Fantastics
programme.desc: Theo turns an errand to fetch a new ball into an imaginative quest to find a lion at the Den. Meanwhile, Barrys practising being a lion mascot for the day. Will the two meet?

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Zahra-Roses family is from Somalia, a country situated on the east coast of Africa. In Somalia, they have the traditional dish of nafaqo, which is boiled egg wrapped in mashed potato. This is what Zahra-Rose has chosen to make for her friends.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: Mr Hammond has just got back from a canoeing trip in Alaska, and Andy is waiting for the mail to arrive. Over the radio, Jen informs Andy that the mail sack is in the Jungle Den. Mr Hammond found a bald eagle feather while in Alaska.

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how lavender plays an important role in the environment. They find out that lavender attracts pollinators like bees and butterflies, who love its smell, but that its scent can also help keep garden pests away. On the way, they take some cuttings to help new lavender to grow and find out just how calming the smell of lavender can be for people too.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet an enormous Komodo dragon and lay an extremely smelly trail for him to find food. In the wild, Komodo dragons will eat almost anything. Next, they meet the Parsons chameleon, which has an astonishing way of catching food.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Following Dodge at Pup School, a place full of mishaps and mayhem. Dodge and his pup pals turn school days into adventures with singing, silliness, and occasional squeaky toys.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: While exploring the Arctic, the Octonauts ship, the Octopod, gets trapped in the ice. Only Barnacles skilful navigation and the help of a friendly Narwhal.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Otto keeps getting cramp while teaching dance class. Vida teaches him that he needs to stretch before and after exercise, and pretty soon hes dancing the day away - and so is the rest of Sweetwood!

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.sub-title: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout
programme.desc: Xuli, Foz and the cadets have travelled to a small island near the Academy for some birdwatching. But when an electrical storm strikes the Academy, they end up stranded! Back in the library, Glitch and Kyan have to use their ingenuity to break out and help the others.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Love Monster is excited to start a Challenge Yourself Day adventure with his friends. Hes planned a mountain hike with a special sunset surprise for them at the peak.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Yukee and Stripes set up their own garden radio station but struggle to find the right music that keeps their audience happy.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, its Banana revealing an astonishing secret about herself in the opera piece, Ive Got a Secret.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Today, Mr Tumble is looking for his pet dogs squeaky toy bone. Meanwhile, Justin is spending the day with his friends and their pet dogs.

programme.title: Get Set Galactic
programme.desc: Two teams touch down at the STARS space station to take on three scientific challenges to win out-of-this world prizes. First, they must work out if an object is heavier or lighter than another before placing it on a giant set of scales. Then the young scientists have to complete a huge fossil by digging for dinosaur parts in ball pits. Finally, the teams must make their way across a giant inflatable version of the solar system.

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Best Wedding
programme.desc: When Nikhil and Jay realise that their parents had two weddings before they were born, they decide to plan another wedding for them: their best wedding yet.

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Its time for a special night-time event on Puffin Rock; the Perseid Meteor Shower. Everyone is excited about seeing the sky filled with shooting stars, except Silky.

programme.title: Nick Copes Popcast
programme.desc: Nick is trying his best to bake a special cake for Grandmas birthday but things dont go to plan. The Popcasters tell him to keep on trying and hell get there in the end.

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?
programme.desc: Maddie finds out about cars. She heads to a car engine factory and with her special cameras finds out how blocks of aluminium metal are melted and made into a car engine. Along the way she meets some robots that help deliver the car parts around the factory! Next, Maddie finds out how cars are loaded onto a car transporter.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Mojo and Bo only wanted to help fix a satellite dish with Mojos Chopper Top. Now theyve been mistaken for a UFO, and the whole town is in a tizzy about invading aliens!

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Young Ben wants to win the Oddpool sandcastle competition. The band head to the beach, and Rio meets a sea genie who gives everyone a big surprise!

programme.title: Waffles After School Club

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Dodge has to learn to work with Tiny after Miss Collie mixes up the pups usual groups.

programme.title: Magic Hands

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Love Monster and Tiniest Fluffiest have trained together so they can win Three Legged Race Day, but disaster strikes when Elder Kitten puts them into different teams.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Vida helps Koa get over his fear of needles when he needs a porcupine quill removed. The key is distractions - more specifically, a very funny joke from Popcorn!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Dad drops an essential gizmo in a hard-to-reach place. Big Lizard takes them on an underwater adventure to meet Ammon, the tentacled solution to their problem!

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the second day of the competition in Cheltenham and the turn of glamorous nurse Jan Blomer to host. Jan hopes to impress with her good honest home cooking: chicken with sun dried tomatoes for her main and home-made ice cream for dessert.

programme.desc: Its the final day of the competition in Cheltenham, and the turn of stay-at-home dad Paddy Castledine to host. Paddy plans to walk away with the prize by serving a simple menu with quality ingredients.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert think he has finally found the one in Angela. Shes an international-trade lawyer whos bright, speaks four languages, clearly loves Robert, and seems too good to be true.

programme.sub-title: The Dog That Rocks the Cradle

Elsewhere, after being fired by the radio station, Bulldog is working in pizza delivery to try and earn a little money. Roz asks him to babysit, but after he begins to work for her, her dates dont seem to go so well.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasiers and Niles new romantic interests create a wedge between the brothers when each thinks the other is moving in on his woman.

programme.desc: Facing financial ruin, actor Nick Cage accepts $1 million to attend a wealthy fans birthday party. Taking on the role of a lifetime, he soon finds himself channeling his most iconic and beloved characters to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours in...
programme.desc: Joe takes Mo Gilligan on a Cypriot odyssey where they get hands-on with halloumi, ride mushroom boats, visit the salt and pepper museum and sample a 24-carat gold ice lolly.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Manhattans Black Pearl, a struggling seafood restaurant with three different owners running the kitchen, has come to chef Gordon Ramsay for help; one of the owners is resistant to change and questions every move Gordon makes.

programme.title: Miriam and Alan: Lost in Scotland and Beyond
programme.desc: Miriam Margolyes and Alan Cumming head to the Isle of Skye for a magical boat trip and wand whittling, before visiting an LGBTQ+ vegan cafe in Glasgow.

programme.title: Miriam and Alan: Lost in Scotland and Beyond
programme.desc: Miriam Margolyes and Alan Cumming head to the Isle of Skye for a magical boat trip and wand whittling, before visiting an LGBTQ+ vegan cafe in Glasgow.

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: When the body of a powerful businesswoman disappears from the morgue, the inspector in charge hunts for the truth. But when he questions her husband he realises that there is much more to the case than meets the eye.

programme.title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
programme.desc: Sunil belongs to a middle-class family, and is intent in pursuing his career with a music group, despite of his dad disapproval. Sunil is also in love with Anna, but she sees him mainly as a friend.

programme.title: Saajan
programme.desc: A poet discovers that he and his best friend are in love with the same woman.

programme.title: Bhediya
programme.desc: While travelling with his cousin for a road-building project, Bhaskar gets bitten by a wolf that gives him new abilities, but the attack also transforms him into a deadly werewolf.

programme.title: RA. One
programme.desc: A video game developers world spirals out of control when his shape-shifting indestructible virtual creation comes to life.

programme.title: Student of the Year
programme.desc: Dean Yoginder Vashisht, retired, has fallen gravely ill. Students from his final year at St Theresas College rush to his side.

programme.title: Jigra
programme.desc: A young woman with a troubled past embarks on a dangerous mission. Her goal is to help her younger brother, who is imprisoned in a foreign jail.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: An ex-cop investigates the death of his best friend and two other spies, killings that lead to a mole operating from Indias embassy in Budapest.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews various media personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the newest movies.

programme.title: Ashoka
programme.desc: A chronicle of the early part of the life of emperor Asoka, beginning with his career as a general in Taxila, a modern-day Russia.

programme.title: Ashoka
programme.desc: A chronicle of the early part of the life of emperor Asoka, beginning with his career as a general in Taxila, a modern-day Russia.

programme.title: Dhaakad Beera
programme.desc: With courage as his superpower, eight-year-old Samrat becomes a one-man army for his baby sister Kishmishs right to live in a world ruled by cruel conventions he doesnt understand.

programme.title: Shiv Shakti: Tap Tyaag Taandav
programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, the Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties whilst offering sacrifices in their mission to care for humanity.

programme.title: The Daily Show
programme.desc: A satirical look at news, trends, pop culture, current events, politics, sports, and entertainment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work
programme.desc: When Rachel returns to her office to show off baby Emma, she is surprised to find handsome temp Gavin has been doing her job while she has been away on maternity leave. Their immediate war of wills prompts Rachel to make a rash decision.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre presents from the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane, where pop superstar Cheryl plays Send to All, singer Peter Andre gets a shock when woken for The Celebrity Midnight Gameshow, and there is also music from George Ezra.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When Mikes younger brother Jim and father Bud visit, a sibling rivalry ensues. Elsewhere, Eve, Mandy and Kristin try to help Bud find a girlfriend.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel gets Monica and Chandler to delay their long-awaited trip to Vermont for Emmas first birthday bash, but problems ensue when Emma falls asleep and a racy cake turns up.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachels Sister Baby-Sits
programme.desc: Rachel regrets trusting her self-indulgent little sister Amy with Emma, Monica regrets asking Joey to write a recommendation letter to the child adoption agency for her, and Phoebe accidentally thwarts the anniversary surprise Mike has in store for her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross applies for a palaeontology grant, but discovers that Dr Hobart - who allocates such funding - used to go out with his girlfriend Charlie. Meanwhile, Mike wants Phoebe to get rid of one of her bizarre paintings, but neither Rachel nor Monica is keen to take it, and Chandler lies to Joey about watching his audition tape.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Home Study
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fuss over their apartment as they expect a visit from the adoption worker. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Mike opt for a small wedding and donate the extra money to a childrens charity.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Late Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Monica reluctantly agrees to cook Thanksgiving dinner, but locks everyone out when they turn up late as Joey and Ross went to a hockey game while Rachel and Phoebe took Emma to a baby beauty contest. Monica also receives some adoption news.

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: Young Maya pesters her dad to tell her why hes getting divorced, so he tells her the story of his (love) life. Has he missed out on his soulmate?

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
programme.desc: Phoebe and Rachel see Chandler getting into a car with a mystery woman and follow them to a large house in the suburbs. They tell Monica of their fears and are shocked by the truth.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Stripper Cries
programme.desc: Joey appears as a celebrity contestant on `The $100,000 Pyramid with its actual host Donny Osmond, but Joeys dubious IQ costs his partner the prize money. Meanwhile, Monica and Rachel hire an ungainly stripper, Roy - without seeing him first - for Phoebes bachelorette party. Also, Chandler and Ross attend a college reunion and meet an attractive woman they both promised not to date during school.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Its Phoebe and Mikes big day, but all does not go to plan. Wedding planner Monica is driving the bride to distraction, New York is hit by its worst blizzard for 20 years, and Joey is taking his role standing in for Phoebes incarcerated father far too seriously. Chandler and Ross are upset that neither of them has a role, until Mike needs to replace one of his groomsmen.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Speaks French
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler discover that their prospective adoptive childs biological father may be a `shovel killer, Ross and Rachel get dangerously close when they go to visit her sick father, and Phoebe struggles to teach Joey French for an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel makes the mistake of going for a job interview at a restaurant where her current boss is also dining. Phoebe discovers she can change her name to whatever she likes - Princess Consuela Bananahammock seems the logical choice, until Mike proves that two can play her game - and Joey, upset that Chandler and Monica are moving, is comforted by an eight-year-old.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Rachel makes a startling announcement, Ross secretly schemes to get her former job back for her. Meanwhile, Joey is so flustered by all of the upheaval in his friends lives that Phoebe prevents him from learning about the sudden death of his agent. Monica and Chandler make a stunning discovery after they check out the house for sale next door to their new home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Going Away Party
programme.desc: As Rachel prepares to leave for Paris, the gang throw a farewell party for her. Instead of facing them all together, she takes each of them aside for a private goodbye. One friend is offended when he is excluded. Meanwhile, Monica barks out orders as she packs precisely for her life in the suburbs with Chandler, and they watch closely the pregnant mother of their future adopted child.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The six friends prepare to say goodbye to each other.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney continue their European adventure in Poland. The boys take in a spot of sightseeing in Krakow, before they don wetsuits and head to a freezing cold lake to try out water blobbing. Next up, they come face to face with mans best friend as Brad gets chased by an attack dog. All before Barney treats his dad to an exclusive performance with the Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra in honour of Polands most famous composer, Chopin.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney arrive in Denmark for the Scandinavian leg of their tour. Bradleys fear of heights is pushed to the limit with a visit to an offshore wind turbine, and the boys test both of their boundaries with a visit to the worlds tallest indoor rope course.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre presents from the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane, where pop superstar Cheryl plays Send to All, singer Peter Andre gets a shock when woken for The Celebrity Midnight Gameshow, and there is also music from George Ezra.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: With their marriage on the rocks, uptight couple Cynthia and Jason convince their friends to join them on a luxury holiday geared towards healing relationship rifts. Arriving at the beautiful Eden resort, the four couples are in for a shock when they discover the punishing regime that awaits them at this island paradise.

programme.title: EDtv
programme.desc: A director of a failing cable channel who comes up with the idea of just broadcasting one persons life, 24 hours-a-day. The chosen subject is video store worker Ed and the show becomes a hit, but with it comes problems: he falls for his brothers girl, and his dad reappears and tensions grow between him and his mother. Somehow, Ed has to get the show cancelled to get his life back.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri for a scathing takedown of pure internet madness, from awkward influencers to social media fails. (S1, E06)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Host Jimmy Carr and team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson return for a new series of `8 Out of 10 Cats. Jimmy once again oversees the disputes and deliberations on the topical events that set the nations chins wagging as Jon and Sean are joined by Joe Wilkinson, Ellie Taylor, Natalie Cassidy and Gabby Logan.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Popstar Jordin Sparks joins for some unforgettable improv chaos.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Beavis and Butt-Head try to donate sperm at a regular bank; Beavis and Butt-Head invent a new Burger World menu item that will make them rich.

programme.desc: A satirical look at news, trends, pop culture, current events, politics, sports, and entertainment.

Next up, they come face to face with mans best friend as Brad gets chased by an attack dog. All before Barney treats his dad to an exclusive performance with the Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra in honour of Polands most famous composer, Chopin.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney arrive in Denmark for the Scandinavian leg of their tour. Bradleys fear of heights is pushed to the limit with a visit to an offshore wind turbine, and the boys test both of their boundaries with a visit to the worlds tallest indoor rope course.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre presents from the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane, where pop superstar Cheryl plays Send to All, singer Peter Andre gets a shock when woken for The Celebrity Midnight Gameshow, and there is also music from George Ezra.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: With their marriage on the rocks, uptight couple Cynthia and Jason convince their friends to join them on a luxury holiday geared towards healing relationship rifts. Arriving at the beautiful Eden resort, the four couples are in for a shock when they discover the punishing regime that awaits them at this island paradise.

programme.title: EDtv
programme.desc: A director of a failing cable channel who comes up with the idea of just broadcasting one persons life, 24 hours-a-day. The chosen subject is video store worker Ed and the show becomes a hit, but with it comes problems: he falls for his brothers girl, and his dad reappears and tensions grow between him and his mother. Somehow, Ed has to get the show cancelled to get his life back.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri for a scathing takedown of pure internet madness, from awkward influencers to social media fails. (S1, E06)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Host Jimmy Carr and team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson return for a new series of `8 Out of 10 Cats. Jimmy once again oversees the disputes and deliberations on the topical events that set the nations chins wagging as Jon and Sean are joined by Joe Wilkinson, Ellie Taylor, Natalie Cassidy and Gabby Logan.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Popstar Jordin Sparks joins for some unforgettable improv chaos.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Beavis and Butt-Head try to donate sperm at a regular bank; Beavis and Butt-Head invent a new Burger World menu item that will make them rich.

programme.title: Expedition X

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: A heartbreaking revelation sends shockwaves through the crew as they tackle their toughest dive site yet in search of millions in gold.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: On the gold, Dustins crew inches closer to a monster payday. On a resupply mission to civilisation, Wes goes missing after a life-threatening fall from the airboat into the raging 36°F river, and the crew fears the worst.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: Last year, Dustins crew struck a six-ounce, $70K nugget -- the biggest in Gold Rush history. This season, hes risking everything to find more. Its all or nothing -- a gamble that could make them millions or end their mining careers forever.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: Dustin and his crew reach their boiling points as exhaustion and the lack of gold at The Wall lead to a world-class fallout. Dustin is forced to take drastic action, calling in help from a controversial source.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: After months of hard work Dustin and his crew have nothing but bruises to show for it. Now under the scorching Alaskan sun, Dustin must make an impossible call. Keep going at The Wall or abandon site and start over.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: Dustin hits rock bottom as hes forced to abandon The Wall dive site after spending all season digging down a deadly 20 feet. The crew finds a new site they call The Golden Straits, and its now a race to find a season-saving pile of gold.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: When the Time Bandit loses power with a storm at its tail, Johnathan deploys a camera probe to find whats snarling his propeller. Keith sets a decoy string to lure Sig away from good fishing, but risks his own secret plan by trusting the wrong ally.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

Then to balance the scales, Nigel makes a couple of dishes full of clean-tasting flavours, with fresh herbs, tomatoes and crunchy greens - but whether saints or sinners, every dish will taste truly divine.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by Galton Blackiston, his pal and a top-class, Michelin-starred chef. They don diving suits to swim with seals, and hire an unusual mode of transport to take them around the islands. Galton visits a sea salt farm and delivers some back to James, who uses it to cook up some wonderful salt-baked sea bass. James finds an unusual restaurant situated in the middle of a post office, and finishes off the day cooking roast duck by a stunning seashore.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James returns to one of his favourite places in the UK: the beautiful county of Cornwall. Joining him is his close pal and Michelin-starred chef Galton Blackiston. During their trip they discover some world-class Cornish ice cream, and Galton visits Newlyn fish market to pick up some Cornish cod. James cooks the cod along with Cornish oysters and a warm tartare sauce. They both round off the day with a painting challenge on Sennen beach, where they try out their oil painting skills.

programme.title: Secrets of the Curry Kitchen
programme.desc: Restaurateur, brilliantly instinctive cook and one of TIME magazines 100 Most Influential People of 2024, Asma Khan, is set to bring the vibrant and delectable world of Indian cuisine to the small screen.

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain kicks off the series by divulging the eight simple spices she uses everyday to create a whole host of mouthwatering meals, starting with four of her favourite feel-good dishes.

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain serves up deliciously treaty meals to rival any takeaway. These four flavour packed dishes - a smoky aubergine pizza, a spicy spin on egg fried rice, a speedy chicken jalfrezi and kulfi ice cream biscuit bars.

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices
programme.desc: Nadiya shares family favourites perfect for any occasion: an authentic chicken curry infused with aromatic whole spices that has been passed down the generations of Nadiyas family, a cumin and dill-laced samosa, a quick, delicious tangy tomato prawn dish, and her sons favourite cake, a sweet cardamom traybake. And food writer Ping Coombes shares her passion for passing down the flavours of her ancestral cooking to her family, with star anise taking a starring role.

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices
programme.desc: Nadiya calls on her simple spices once again to create deliciously easy dishes to whip up with barely any effort at all: a wickedly cheeky spin on a classic breakfast muffin.

programme.title: Maneets Eats
programme.desc: Chef Maneet Chauhan shares two more favourite Indian recipes, starting with crispy spinach and onion Pakoras; Maneet makes Saag Paneer, a vegetarian meal made from curdled paneer and a mix of bright greens.

programme.title: Maneets Eats
programme.desc: Chef Maneet Chauhan prepares an Indian breakfast, the masala omelet sandwich, with traditional Indian spices and Amul cheese; Maneet makes two types of stuffed Parathas, one with a creamy pea filling and one with a spiced carrot filling.

programme.title: Ravneet Gills Chop House
programme.desc: Ravneet and Mattie gear up to open their unique take on a traditional chop house. They test a pork and mash recipe and a unique Black Forest gateau.

programme.title: Ravneet Gills Chop House

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands

programme.title: James Martins American Adventure

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. programme.title: Pink Floyd: Delicate Sound of Thunder

programme.title: Pink Floyd at Pompeii
programme.desc: Set in the hauntingly beautiful ruins of the ancient Roman Amphitheatre in Pompeii, Italy, Pink Floyd performs an intimate concert without an audience. Filmed in October 1971, the performance features unforgettable tracks.

programme.title: Have You Got It Yet? The Story of Syd Barrett and Pink Floyd
programme.desc: Following the moment Syd Barrett was kicked out of the his band, Pink Floyd, from the narrative of him going from groundbreaking musician to iconic rocker and manic, unstable star.

programme.title: The Doors Live at the Bowl 68

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.desc: Looking at the creation of classic albums goes behind the Doors eponymous debut album. With the use of interviews, musical demonstration, archive footage and live performances, the documentary tells the story behind the conception and recording of the album, and the three surviving members of the Doors share memories of the bands early days, how the album was put together and of Morrison himself.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: The LEGO NINJAGO Movie
programme.desc: Master Wu, as wise-cracking as he is wise, leads a fierce team of secret ninja warriors to defeat the evil warlord Garmadon and save Ninjago City.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
programme.desc: Canine rocker Bodi and his band discover the price of fame when they go on tour with pop sensation Lil Foxy.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Gunslinger Cole Thornton rides into a small town to work for a cattle baron, but quits after learning that his would-be employer wants to drive a family off their land and obtain their water supply. Thornton leaves the situation unresolved, but a chance encounter takes him back to El Dorado, where he joins the sheriff in a range war.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: Caught in limbo for years in Irelands immigration system, a young Nigerian woman develops a friendship with an employee who she meets at one of the accommodation centres.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens novel, `Oliver Twist, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save Sonnys mom and foil Slappys wicked plan.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guys insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: After returning to his Hawaiian home, a soldier takes a job with a tourist bureau against the advice of his parents.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: After returning to his Hawaiian home, a soldier takes a job with a tourist bureau against the advice of his parents.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guys insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.
