programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villians

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In 2041 central Europe, Detective Em investigates the case of a murdered couple where a restoration team brings one of them back to life.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome to M Night Shyamalans 2024 blockbuster `Trap.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Its been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Lauries ready for him.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a familys pet cat is called, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which, it is believed, can revive the dead, although in doing so they create a monster.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.sub-title: An American Girl in Paris (Part Deux)

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Are men in their twenties the new designer drug? Carrie, Miranda and Samantha experience the pros and cons of dating twenty-something guys, and Charlottes forty-something boyfriend asks an unusual sexual favour.

programme.desc: Jack is shocked to learn that he has a son of his own, and is reluctant to get to know him, while Grace is shocked when Will and Nathan bond.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: The Third Wheel Gets the Grace
programme.desc: Will and Grace resume their chummy relationship, leaving Nathan feeling left out in the cold, and Jack and his son go shopping for school supplies.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will is unnerved when his firm hires a new attorney who turns out to be his worst enemy from school. Meanwhile, Grace gets Nathan what she thinks is the perfect birthday present, until Karen trumps her with a better one. She then buys him an expensive watch, which he hates, and confesses her love for him.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Jack convinces Grace to accompany his young son to his school dance, rekindling memories of Graces own unhappy school dance days, and Karen takes great pleasure in taking advantage of her lawyer Will.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Stan is arrested for tax evasion, and Grace feels so sorry for Karen that she moves in with her, quickly becoming accustomed to a life of servants, bubble bath and luxury. As Stans attorney, Will is so struck with stage fright when he appears on TV, that he agrees to Jacks plan to improve his communication skills by attending an acting class presided over by a domineering teacher.

programme.desc: The definitive story of Everton at the peak of their powers in the mid-1980s, when they became the best side in the land. programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years - that can withstand the harshest conditions - and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any other - the enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: Making our first friends is something we cant forget and its the same in the wild. Here, discover the importance of having allies and gaining trust in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Shark Squad

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Discover the most fantastic city of them all lying beneath the waves, where romance and migratory commuters flood the coral reefs main highways. Follow a green sea turtle looking for love and sit in with a cassowary dad tending his newborn chicks.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Feel the heat of summers arrival as supersize sea snails try to fend off an invading gang of coral-hungry starfish. Accompany reef sharks as they prowl for a midnight meal and marvel at the slippery disguise a parrotfish uses to survive the night.

programme.title: Supersenses

programme.title: Supersenses
programme.desc: Discorver why and how some of the worlds most amazing animals use their special powers to survive in a diverse range of environments, and how they push the limits of engineering to achieve incredible feats that humans can only dream of.

programme.title: Supersenses
programme.desc: Compared to some animals, human senses are sorely limited. Beyond our scope of perception, there is an invisible world that humans know little about, but that some animals rely on in order to survive.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Its a bug-eating world out there, and the documentary continues with a look at how the various critters disable the defences of their respective prey.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Dating is just as tricky a business in the insect world, and Sir David Attenborough finds out how certain bugs choose and then woo their partners.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough reveals how different bugs usher in the next generation, including the butterfly and harvestman spider.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Join Sir David Attenborough as he zooms in on a set of bugs who prefer co-operation to conflict. Features the likes of the burrowing cockroach and the queen bee.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough takes a tour of the insect worlds vast colonies, which rival human megacities in terms of size and complexity.

programme.desc: From turf wars, to food fights, to mating mayhem, nature is all about competition and the quest to be the best. Every day, the planet is a battleground as animals go head to head with their own kind.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Feel the heat of summers arrival as supersize sea snails try to fend off an invading gang of coral-hungry starfish. Accompany reef sharks as they prowl for a midnight meal and marvel at the slippery disguise a parrotfish uses to survive the night.

programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough explores the volcanic islands and biological wonderland of Galapagos in this three-part documentary. Here, he charts the archipelagos explosive rise from the ocean millions of years ago, and takes a look at its unique wildlife.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Journey
programme.desc: Follow David Attenborough around the globe as he films David Attenboroughs First Life.

Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Journey
programme.desc: Follow David Attenborough around the globe as he films David Attenboroughs First Life.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...
programme.desc: With the help of Drag Race stars The Vivienne and Baga Chips, Rob and Romesh are transformed into their drag persona. Afterwards, they meet icon Michelle Visage and dive into the world of drag performing.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: During a hiking trip, Powell and Gamble stumble upon an illegal weed farm and find themselves taking on a dangerous cartel.

programme.title: Revival
programme.desc: As the dead return to life in a small town, Officer Dana Cypress unearths a new deadly mystery.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live
programme.desc: Live from New York, its Saturday night. Politicians and celebrities are in the firing line as SNL brings together its unique mix of sketches and satire.

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad
programme.desc: Karl Pilkingtons got company this time around - film and TV star Warwick Davis. Following in the footsteps of Marco Polo, the odd couple start off in Venice.

programme.title: The Force: Manchester
programme.desc: Fast-paced documentary series following the 999 work of Greater Manchester Police. Englands second largest police force, its responsible for protecting 2.7 million people.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: More action-packed endeavours from the Proactive Elite Unit. The team tackle Russian scam artists, a mini-moto menace and a dangerous driver.

programme.title: Chucky
programme.sub-title: The Sinners Are Much More Fun
programme.desc: Chucky arrives at Incarnate Lord, filled with a murderous agenda; a detective questions Tiffany about Nicas disturbing death.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Television presenter and avid `Most Haunted viewer Gaby Roslin joins in Cheshire. As events escalate to a chilling finale, a curious combination of baths, bees and books ensure that their stay is far from pleasant.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and Derek Acorah conduct more chilling paranormal investigations as they visit the Black Swan Hotel in Devizes. They examine the scene of an old crime, hoping to identify both victim and villain, and are helped by guest psychic Uri Geller to reveal the shocking secret lying beneath the streets of Wiltshire.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: A warm welcome awaits the team across the Irish Sea, but as night falls and the lights go out at Kinnitty Castle, a series of startling and eerie events shake and scare every screaming member of the crew one by one.

programme.title: Ape vs. Mecha Ape
programme.desc: Recognizing the power of its captive giant ape, the military designs its own battle-ready robot, Mecha Ape. When its first test goes horribly wrong, the military must release the imprisoned giant ape to stop the colossal war machine.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The death of one of the most brilliant humans in the universe has a startling effect on Data.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The crew fights against a mysterious disease which accelerates the natural ageing process, causing humans to die of old age within a matter of days.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rikers integrity is put to the test when he volunteers to serve on a Klingon ship. Thanks to Worfs coaching, he does pretty well - but then the Klingons suspect the Enterprise of planting a corrosive organism on their hull.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When the USS Enterprise arrives at a newly-established Starbase, Data is ordered to serve Captain Bruce Maddox, who wishes to disassemble Data to study him. When Data learns that Maddox may not be able to reassemble him, he refuses and Picard is enlisted to defend his rights in court.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The USS Enterprise is assigned to escort a young girl, Salia, and her guardian to the planet she was born to rule. On the way, however, Salia has a chance encounter with Wesley, who is instantly and obviously smitten.

programme.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: When Archer and Trip are invited to a desert-like planet by an alien leader, they discover he is a terrorist who has lured them onto his planet under false pretences. Meanwhile, TPol, while in command, faces a tough decision when she cannot locate Archer and Trip in the desert.

programme.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: Archer, Trip and Reed all have mysterious encounters with females who may not be all they appear. Meanwhile, Hoshi has trouble learning a new language.

programme.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: Starfleet orders the Enterprise home after the crew seemingly causes the destruction of an alien planet they were exploring; Archer travels through time with Daniels to thwart Suliban plans.

programme.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew is held hostage by the Suliban while Captain Archer remains trapped in the 31st century, and Daniels agonises that his impulsive act will jeopardise the existence of the Federation and forever change the course of history.

programme.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: TPol disputes accepted accounts, telling Archer and Trip a story about her great-grandmother and three other Vulcans crash landing in Pennsylvania in the 1950s.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: A prison escapee from Hanks past returns on a quest for vengeance, leaving a trail of bodies in his wake. As the investigation continues, Nick comes to realise that this man is more than initially suspected and finds himself up against a rare and nearly unstoppable Wesen. After being battered in his own home and put in the hospital by his damage resistant foe, Nick turns to Monroe to end the violence and save Hanks life.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Nick and Hank investigate the death of a man described by all as a `jerk and in the process finds that two of the mans neighbours are Wesen. Juliette begins to worry as she notices several strangers taking pictures of her and Nicks house while elsewhere Monroe is beaten by Reapers for his assistance and friendship with Nick.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: While investigating the death of a homeless teen, Nick and Hank uncover the harvesting of human organs.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: A mysterious woman seduces men, then gruesomely murders them. Can Nick uncover her secret before she kills again?

programme.desc: Replaced at work by a box, Victor embarks on his enforced retirement. As an erstwhile security officer, he finds it exasperatingly difficult to adapt to this directionless new existence, and he begins magnifying mundane aspects of everyday life into major dramas.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Margaret tries to help her husband cope with early retirement by getting him a book from the library entitled `Coping with Old Age. Maybe keep-fit classes at the local adult education centre will help take Victors mind off the depressing turn of events?

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Sardonic Victors life continues to be a trial - someone paints graffiti on the side of his house and the central heating system is making a deafening noise. To add to that theres a nasty smell coming from the living-room.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor is unable to sleep, and things get so desperate that he contemplates opening Ronnie and Mildreds Christmas present from last year.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: The Meldrews house is burgled, with the help of the neighbours, and Victor encounters an old school friend who mistakes him for someone else.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Mrs Warboys has an interesting tale to tell to two ladies in a tea shop. Victor has an even more interesting time with a chimpanzee at the local fete, but where is Margaret whilst all this is going on?

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Focusing on the 11th century building programme undertaken by the Normans, which resulted in impressive fortress cathedrals at Peterborough and Ely and a magnificent castle in Rochester.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Fred investigates the construction of the great chain of castles of North Wales, revealing the building techniques and the defensive features that helped Edwards I subdue the rebellious Welsh.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Fred looks at how carpenters have used their talents to transform buildings such as Stockey Castle, Little Moreton Hall and Harvington Hall.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Fred focuses on Scottish baronial style. At Glamis Castle, Fred reveals how a simple sandstone tower house was transformed with the help of stonemasons from Aberdeen and plasterers from Italy. In addition, he visits the house of Dun near Montrose and Culezean Castle on the Ayshire coast.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Made in Britain
programme.desc: Fred visits Ryhope pumping station in Sunderland, meets the volunteers who maintain the museum, travels across the Middlesborough transporter bridge and sees the Israel Newton boiler works in Bradford.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Made in Britain
programme.desc: Fred fulfils an ambition by driving across the imposing Scammonden Bridge over the M62, then visits Sheffield to take a tour round a forge and to watch crucible steel being produced.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare 1968 Honda N600 car emerges from a lock-up in County Durham and Derek travels Scotland to collect an original RAC Bedford van.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of a North Yorkshire-based, family-run historic car auction business, which uncovers some remarkably rare vehicles in Thornton-le-Dale. The Mathwesons attract all kinds of classic car buyers from all over the country.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek points the team towards one of his favourite motors - a 1983 Daimler Double Six. And a Triumph 2000 is given a modern day makeover under the bonnet.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare and much-loved 1964 Ford Capri Consul coupe comes up for auction. Paul takes a 1957 Leyland Comet truck for a spin, and Dave admits that high on his wish-list is a Citroen 2CV.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Theres a surprise waiting for Derek in Hull - a MGSA sports car that once had a tree growing through it. Plus, in North Wales, Alan Holmes is selling his sons Ford Escort RS 1600i.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A series of head-turning supercharged cars head to the Mathewsons aution room. Plus, going under Dereks hammer - a Ford Escort XR3 and a beautiful MGA.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads out topick up a pair of beautiful Swedish models - a Saab 96L and a Volvo P1800ES. Plus, a rare British AC Aceca comes up for sale.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: An 1967 Aston Martin DB6 lands at the Mathewsons - Derek believes it could break the record for the most expensive car ever sold at the auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A collection of Austin Mini Metros arrive for auction. Also going under the hammer is a baby Fiat 850 coupe and a haulier offloads part of his vintage commercial vehicles collection.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Hate Story 3
programme.desc: Aditya, a successful businessman, stepped on toes and made enemies on his way to the top. Now, one of those enemies has returned for revenge.

programme.title: Waqt
programme.desc: Members of a family get separated in a natural disaster and years later their lives intertwine.

programme.title: Kaala Patthar
programme.desc: Branded a coward for abandoning his ship full of 300 passengers, Captain Vijay Pal Singh takes up work in a distant coal mine, poorly equipped, with no sufficient medical supplies or proper facilities. When the miners and their families face a catastrophe, as water has forced its way into one of the mining tunnels, endangering 400 lives, will Vijay be able to rise to the occasion or will he `abandon ship again?

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: Three men who were raised in different households do not realise that they are brothers.

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli
programme.desc: When two ambitious dreamers and schemers from a pair of dead-end towns meet up, girl and boy team Bunty and Babli is unleashed on the world, giving rise to a series of increasingly wild and wacky capers. From spiritual gurus to gangster and moll, from business partners to vagabonds, the duo runs rings round rajahs and millionaires, ministers and explorers, but most of all, policeman Dashrath Singh.

programme.title: Brahmastra Part One: Shiva
programme.desc: With Isha by his side, DJ Shiva rises to a crescendo of love and fortitude to embrace his role as the chosen protector of the universes most powerful weapon.

programme.title: Tiger Zinda Hai
programme.desc: An East Indian agent joins forces with a Pakistani agent to battle a ruthless militant.

programme.title: Monsoon Shootout
programme.desc: Shiva, a rookie cop, lives out two possible futures after a confrontation with a notorious hit man.

programme.title: Meri Jung
programme.desc: The story of Deepak Verma, an innocent man who is framed for a murder and is wrongly sentenced to death. His son grows up to become lawyer and wants to avenge his fathers death.

programme.title: Lootcase
programme.desc: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He knows nothing about who it belongs to, where its from, or how it got there. Nandan has to decide whether or not to take it or leave it.

programme.title: Hasee Toh Phasee
programme.desc: Shes smart, but shes also quirky, geeky and a magnet for trouble. And, thats exactly what makes Nikhil fall for his fiancees sister, Meeta. With so many hurdles, their love seems set for disaster.

programme.title: Band Baaja Baaraat
programme.desc: Shruti and Bittoo, two graduates from Delhi, reluctantly enter the business world together by creating a wedding planning enterprise.

programme.title: Kapoor and Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Baghban
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra and his wife Pooja have raised a family of four sons who are now nicely settled in their respective professions, but when Raj and Pooja decide to retire, none of their sons are willing to take care of them.

programme.title: Ishaqzaade
programme.desc: A story of two people who were born to hate but destined to love.

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mothers promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
programme.desc: Embracing love above all, strong-willed Saas-Bahus keep the Viranis together. But when conspirators try to create a rift, will their familial bond prevail?

programme.title: Ishani
programme.desc: Following a twist of fate that results in the death of her dreams, Ishani becomes evasive as she embarks on a mission to reinvent herself and seek love.

programme.desc: Anupamaa, a warmhearted homemaker, receives neglect and ridicule in return for lavishing her family with affection, but there comes a time when she finds the ones who truly appreciate her.

programme.desc: Strong-willed Khushis world revolves around her father, and she enters a marriage contract with Krishna, a conman, in order to save him.
